plot: Galder and Silenoz play guitar for Dimmu Borgir, the legendary black metal band from Norway. Their blistering twin-guitar attack and unique symphonic sound has established them as one of today's most visionary bands.
title: Behind the Player: Dimmu Borgir
plot_es: Galder and Silenoz play guitar for Dimmu Borgir, the legendary black metal band from Norway. Their blistering twin-guitar attack and unique symphonic sound has established them as one of today's most visionary bands.
plot_en: Galder and Silenoz play guitar for Dimmu Borgir, the legendary black metal band from Norway. Their blistering twin-guitar attack and unique symphonic sound has established them as one of today's most visionary bands.
